title: List of Sigma Nu brothers
data: Three time All-American and 1945 Heisman trophy winner for Army ( after joining Sigma Nu at UNC )
Coached several college football teams ( most notably , his alma mater Alabama ) for a career record of 323-85-17
Former collegiate and professional football player
Sports administrator who became the third executive director of the National Collegiate Athletic Association from 1994 to 2003
American college football coach at Georgia Tech . He was elected to the College Football Hall of Fame as a player and coach , something that only three people have accomplished

American college basketball standout and a professional baseball first baseman . During a 13-year career in Major League Baseball , he played for the Boston Red Sox ( 1949-1952 ) , Detroit Tigers ( 1952-1954 ) , Chicago White Sox ( 1955-1958 ) , Cincinnati Redlegs ( 1958-1959 ) and Baltimore Orioles ( 1959-1961 )
pitcher , manager , and executive in Major League Baseball

Two-time Atlantic Coast Conference Coach of the Year , winning the award in 2002 and 2007 . Groh has over 38 years of professional and collegiate coaching experience ; this history includes 13 seasons in the NFL , a Super Bowl title with the New York Giants , and over a decade of working under coach Bill Parcells
Former collegiate and professional football player
Eight Time Olympic Gold Medalist and one of the greatest standing jumpers of the early Olympic era
